cab.content: SECRET.fThis Document is the Property of ^is.,8,',tannfc Mfj^tTs Government)21412BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 8th MAY, 1918.1* At about 9S45 this morning the Germans launched an attack against our positions between ELZENWALLE and LA CLYTTE b The extent of the attack is not yet known* but It is estimated that at least one German division was employed a The enemy is reported to have captured RIDGE WOOD, and entered our line at certain points between RIDGE 7,r0OD and KLEIN VIERSTRAATo We hold KLEIN VIERSTRAATo It is believed that the situation is nc?j in hand and that arrangements. are being made to rsgain the ground lost. 2. On the rest of the front there is no change.General Staff,?;ar Office, S.\V*!* 3th May, 1918. I Issued at 6*30 p*m.
